subject: Entrepreneurship
title: The Pitch Deck: Telling Your Story in 12 Slides
description: Learn The Pitch Deck: Telling Your Story in 12 Slides in one minute.

hook.text: Airbnb's original pitch deck was 10 slides. It raised $600K. Today it's studied in business schools.

buildup.text: A pitch deck is a visual story: problem, solution, market, traction, team, and the ask.

discovery.text: Investors spend an average of 3 minutes on a deck. Every slide must earn its place.

twist.text: The best decks don't convince with data alone. They make investors feel the problem viscerally.

climax.text: Sequoia's recommended format: 10-12 slides, big fonts, one idea per slide, no walls of text.

punchline.text: A pitch deck doesn't close the deal. It opens the conversation.

quiz.question: What is the primary purpose of a startup pitch deck?
options: To tell a compelling story that opens a conversation with investors
To provide a complete business plan with financial details
To replace the need for a formal business plan
